A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I have not hated anything so much. 

I never review movies\, my bar for a good movie is so low it's actually hard to disappoint me. If I could go back in time and not watch this movie\, I would. It was not only a bad movie\, it literally ruined the trilogy for me. I have 0 interest in seeing 9. The disdain this movie has for the rest of the lore is mind blowing. I've never seen a movie take a literal shit on things I love about a series.

I left in utter disgust and disbelief.... and I liked the prequels.
